item.title: An Introduction to Functional Thinking: Actions, Calculations, and Data
item.description: Background I’m Learning Functional Programming Lately, I’ve started to dip my toes into the fountain of functional programming, and it has been really interesting and awesome! It feels like a breath of fresh air and more natural compared to typical OOP, and I want to share what I’ve learned with you! Grokking Simplicity To fill in my knowledge gaps on functional programming, I’m reading an amazing book by Eric Normand called Grokking Simplicity.
